title: Futbol Americas: U.S. Open Cup Final Preview
description:
On Monday's episode of Futbol Americas, Sebastian Salazar and Herculez Gomez are joined by Sacramento Republic head coach Mark Briggs and Orlando City winger Facundo Torres to preview the U.S. Open Cup Final on Wednesday. The guys also recap the weekend action in MLS. Are you cool with Chicharito taking a 'Panenka' penalty kick in stoppage time? Then Angel City FC President and Co-founder Julie Urhman joins the show to discuss the Copa Angelina between Angel City and the Women's Mexican National Team.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
